org.baswell.sessioncookie

Class SessionCookieRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baswell.sessioncookie.SessionCookieRequestHandler

  • public class SessionCookieRequestHandler
extends Object
    Responsible for setting up a HttpServletRequest with a HttpSession backed by client cookies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SessionCookieRequestHandler(SessionCookieParameters parameters, SessionCookieErrorHandler errorHandler) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, SessionCookieRequestChain chain)
      Sets up the given request with a session backed by client cookies and continues the request pipeline by calling SessionCookieRequestChain.forward(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                   SessionCookieRequestChain chain)
            throws IOException,
                   javax.servlet.ServletException
        Sets up the given request with a session backed by client cookies and continues the request pipeline by calling SessionCookieRequestChain.forward(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse). This method should be called earlier in the request pipeline.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP request
        response - The HTTP response
        chain - The request chain processor used to forward the request down the request pipeline
        Throws:
        IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException
